item.title: Flash Card App for Learning Swedish
item.description: I threw together some shit to learn Swedish words. It ain’t pretty but it fucking works. My people wanted it so I did it. An hour or two of my life. https://svenska.davor.se That’s where it’s at. I spewed it on reddit and the bastards liked it. It’s getting used. The ones who matter dig it. Want more. The code is shit but it’s on Github I’ll clean it up. Later.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: After a couple of years of this domain just being used for email, I’ve decided to start a blog. I’m not sure what I’ll write about yet, but I’m sure I’ll figure it out as I go along. I’m using Hugo to generate the site, and I’m hosting it on Github. Looking forward to seeing where this goes.
